tag.raw: Fred H. Morlan Collection. Morlan enlisted in the Army Air Corps in 1917. He was a pilot and Captain in the Air Service by Oct. 1918. Morlan was reassigned from the 86th Aero Squadron to the 110th Aere Replacement Squadron
tag.author: 49487266@N07

description._content: SDASM.CATALOG: Morlan_00019 SDASM.TITLE: Army of the Potomac Plaque SDASM.DATE: 1918-1930 SDASM.LOCATION: Adams, PA, United States SDASM.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: Customized postcard SDASM.COLLECTION: Fred H. Morlan Collection. Morlan enlisted in the Army Air Corps in 1917. He was a pilot and Captain in the Air Service by Oct. 1918. Morlan was reassigned from the 86th Aero Squadron to the 110th Aere Replacement Squadron PUBLIC COMMONS.SOURCE INSTITUTION: San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive
